en.title: [4Q 2024] Pocket Stats
en.description: A collection of condensed infographics summarising key indicators and developments for the most recent quarter.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly Pocket Stats, covering key indicators and developments for the most fourth quarter.

bm.title: [ST4 2024] Poket Stats
bm.description: Koleksi infografik padat yang merumuskan indikator dan kemajuan penting bagi suku tahun terkini.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan Poket Stats suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi indikator dan kemajuan penting bagi suku tahun keempat.
